chunk:
Directions: Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin. For best results, use twice daily on face, neck and back of hands.

Warnings: For external use only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2086-PETER THOMAS ROTH Potent C Ferulic Power Serum
